identity.name: Upstate Hot Tubs
identity.tone: American • Premium • Clean • Healthy Lifestyle • Trustworthy
identity.target_audience: Homeowners in SC & FL, Families, Military/Veterans, Health-conscious

layout.grid_system: Use 'Bento' grid (CSS Grid) for product categories. Avoid uniform e-commerce grids.

buttons.primary: bg-secondary text-white hover:bg-secondary-light rounded-none uppercase font-bold tracking-widest px-8 py-4 transition-all hover:scale-105 shadow-lg
buttons.secondary: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white rounded-none uppercase font-bold tracking-widest px-8 py-4 transition-all
buttons.jingle_float: fixed bottom-8 right-8 z-50 bg-secondary text-white p-4 rounded-full shadow-2xl hover:scale-110 cursor-pointer animate-pulse-slow

cards.product: group relative overflow-hidden bg-white shadow-md hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-500 border border-slate-100
cards.feature: p-8 bg-slate-50 border-l-4 border-secondary hover:bg-white transition-colors

navigation.style: sticky top-0 z-40 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-slate-100 bg-white/90
navigation.link: text-primary font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:text-secondary transition-colors text-sm

visual_enhancers.borders: Sharp corners (rounded-none) for a 'Strong/American' feel, or minimal rounded-sm.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-lg for floating elements, shadow-sm for cards.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on solid backgrounds. Water ripple effects on hover.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (clean, stroke-based). Use 'Flag' icon for patriotism.

rules: Focus states must be visible (ring-2 ring-primary).

preferences.hover: Scale 1.05 for images, underline slide for links

hero.alt: Luxury hot tub in forest setting

content_strategy.slogan: Start Living Your Healthiest Life Today.

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL: npm install framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot lenis
CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js to include the specific colors and fonts defined above.
LAYOUT: Do not use a sidebar. Use a sticky top navbar.
JINGLE: Create a 'JinglePlayer' component that is fixed position. Default state is Muted. User must click to play.
FORMS: Use Netlify compatible form attributes (name='contact' method='POST' data-netlify='true').
SEO: Ensure all headings are semantic (H1, H2, H3).
PERFORMANCE: Use 'lazy' loading for all images below the fold.
THEME: STRICTLY LIGHT MODE. Do not implement a dark mode toggle. The brand is 'Clean & Bright'.
universal_guidelines: Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters for the sticky header.
Interactive elements must include data-testid attributes.
